name: Barbie Superpack: Secret Agent Barbie & Barbie: Groovy Games
overview: Fans of Mattel's blonde beauty get two previously released games on this single cartridge from VU. Included are GBA versions of Secret Agent Barbie and Barbie: Groovy Games. In Secret Agent Barbie, players progress through a series missions across international locales. A group of thieves has stolen the royal jewels, so it is up to Barbie to crack the case and bring them to justice. In Groovy Games, Barbie joins with six of her friends to play nine mini-games, including classics like checkers and tic-tac-toe, as well as "groovy" takes on concentration, matching, arcade shooting, and word games.
